alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:05PM EDT until September 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WINDHAM COUNTY... At 405 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Putney, or near Brattleboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Putney, Vernon, Westminster, Guilford Center, Guilford, North Vernon, East Dummerston, East Putney, Fairview Village, East Putney Station, Dummerston Center, West Brattleboro, Putney Station, Naulahka and Westminster Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
